name: Ophanie Kitchen Mats for Floor, 3/4 inch Thick, 20x32 Anti Fatigue Cushioned Mat, Kitchen Rugs, Waterproof, Comfort Ergonomic Standing Mat for Office, Home, Sink, Black Non-Slip Ridged Bottom
short_description: [Exceptional Comfort & Support] – Say goodbye to fatigue with the Ophanie Anti-Fatigue Mat. Made with a 0.75-inch thick cushion of high-density PU recycled foam, this mat provides superior shock absorption and long-lasting support for your feet, legs, and back—ideal for standing for extended periods.

[Premium-Grade Materials] – Crafted for durability, our mat features a 1.2mm PVC leather surface with a soft-touch texture, paired with a resilient, eco-friendly foam core. It resists wear, tear, and deformation, even with daily use, making it a reliable companion for your workspace.

[Stable & Certified Safe] – The slip-resistant backing and beveled, progressive ramp edge ensure the mat stays securely in place, reducing the risk of trips. Plus, with CP65 and GRS certifications, you can trust it's safe for your home, kitchen, or office.

[Versatile for Any Space] - Whether you're cooking, working at a standing desk, or folding laundry, the Ophanie mat is essential for any standing environment. Its modern design and textured surface enhance grip while adding both style and functionality to any room.

[Flat-Packed, Ready to Use] - Delivered flat, not rolled, our mat arrives in perfect condition with no unsightly curls or creases. The high-resilience foam returns to it original shape after use, ensuring lasting comfort and performance.
Note: For optimal anti-slip performance, use on a clean, dry floor. While our non-slip bottom outperforms competitors on dry surfaces, it may be less effective on wet floors.

name: Ergonomic Anti-Fatigue Mat for Standing Desks - 20 x 30 [508 x 762 mm] Standing Desk Mat
short_description: Increase your comfort and prevent fatigue while standing at your desk with this ergonomically designed floor mat, 20" x 30" (508 x 762 mm)
Anti-Fatigue Mat made of durable Premium Polyurethane makes the ideal accessory for standing desks or sit-stand ergonomic workstations, with anti-slip bottom and beveled edge to help prevent tripping
Ergonomically designed standing desk mat encourages healthy movement to increase circulation, reduce strain and bring comfort to your work day
Comfort mat features PVC leather-pattern finish in attractive black with durable low-static surface for easy cleaning, and is conveniently sized to tuck away under your desk when not in use

Ergonomic standing mat / Cushion mat for standing / Standing mat for desk / Office standing mat / Sit-stand desk mat / Cushion mat for standing desk / Comfort standing mat / Ergonomic standing pad / Ergonomic mat for standing desk
product_description: Work more comfortably at your standing desk or sit-stand workstation, with this anti-fatigue mat. It offers a durable cushioned surface to stand on throughout your workday, and it’s conveniently sized to tuck under your desk when you’re not using it. Add more comfort to your ergonomic workstation This durable anti-fatigue mat helps you stay comfortable while enjoying the health benefits of not sitting in a chair all day. Standing for periods during your day can bring many health benefits, including increasing your body’s metabolism and alertness. Now, you can work in greater comfort with this anti-fatigue floor mat. It’s ergonomically designed to encourage movement as you stand, which helps to increase blood circulation, and reduce strain on your feet, knees, hips and back. Through increased muscle movement, you will experience less fatigue and strain, resulting in greater comfort throughout your day. Made for long-lasting performance The anti-fatigue mat is made of premium polyurethane foam, providing effective cushioning for maximum comfort and durability. The water-resistant surface is designed for long-lasting performance and easy cleaning. The anti-fatigue floor mat is conveniently sized at 20” x 30” (508 x 762 mm), large enough to allow freedom of movement, while compact enough to tuck under your desk when not in use. Reduces risk of slipping or tripping The anti-slip bottom ensures the standing desk mat stays in place and helps to reduce the risk of slipping. The beveled edge also helps to prevent tripping as you move throughout your work day. The STSMAT is backed by a StarTech. Please note: the anti-fatigue mat is not intended for use with high heels, which may cause damage to the mat surface.

name: 1" Extra Thick Anti Fatigue Floor Mat,Kitchen Mat, Standing Desk Mat – Comfort at Home, Office, Garage - Advanced PU Foam (Black, 30" L x 20" W)
short_description: Ergonomic Comfort:Specially designed with a 1-inch extra-thick cushion, this standing mat offers exceptional comfort and fatigue relief. The surface is covered with a custom 1.2mm thick wear-resistant leather, designed for long-term use and easy maintenance—simply wipe clean with a damp cloth, whether used as a standing desk mat or an anti-fatigue kitchen mat.

Premium Foam:Made from high-quality polyurethane (PU) material, this mat features 140D high-pressure integrated molded foam for high density and superior rebound. Compared to other types of foam, it provides stronger foot support, better resilience, and enhanced fatigue resistance. It won’t collapse or deform even after long-term use. Naturally foamed without paint or glue, this mat is odor-free and safe.

Non-Slip Design:The bottom of the mat features specially engineered anti-slip textures and an innovative micro-stick surface technology that enhances grip and keeps the mat securely in place. The beveled edge design reduces the risk of tripping. For best anti-slip performance, use only on clean, dry floors.
Multi-Purpose Use:Perfect for standing desks, offices, kitchen counters, laundry rooms, and workbenches. This standing mat is ideal for anyone who stands for long periods at home or at work.

Note:To ensure product quality, we use rolled packaging for shipping. This helps prevent damage to the mat during transport, such as creases or punctures. The mat may appear slightly curved upon arrival—simply lay it flat on the floor for 72+ hours to restore its original shape, or place it under sunlight for a few hours to speed up the flattening process.
